nodes.text: The C-210 Elite Watchman Saboteur was a make of blaster pistol available on worlds such as Coruscant and Dromund Kaas during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. They were silver in color and sold for 135. Parts of the weapon were modifiable, including its color crystal, though the unmodified version fired orange blaster bolts.

The C-210 Elite Watchman Saboteur first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released by BioWare in 2011. The pistol can only be used by members of the smuggler or bounty hunter classes. Smugglers can choose it as a reward from the "Race the Devil" class quest on the planet Coruscant and bounty hunters can choose it as a reward from the "Joy Ride" quest on the planet Dromund Kaas. It is not clear where the players acquire the pistol from during the quests. This article makes no assumption about which reward players chose in the respective quests.
